articles.content: Bhojpuri actor Annapurna, popularly known as Amrita Pandey, died by suicide at her apartment in Bhagalpur, Bihar on April 27. Before dying, she posted a cryptic post on Instagram about 'sinking a boa… [+2066 chars]

articles.author: Santanu Das
articles.title: Sonakshi Sinha exclusive interview: ‘The entire set broke into standing ovation after the first take in Tilasmi Bahein’ - Hindustan Times
articles.description: In this exclusive chat with Hindustan Times, Sonakshi Sinha shares her experience about playing the vengeful Fareedan in Heeramandi. | Bollywood
articles.content: Sonakshi Sinha is ready to take on strong female protagonists and surprise her audience with each new role. The actor plays Fareedan in Sanjay Leela Bhansali's Heeramandi - The Diamond Bazaar. It mar… [+8107 chars]
